about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Flutter developer passionate about building beautiful and efficient mobile applications. Using Flutter and Dart, I create cross-platform apps that run seamlessly on both Android and iOS. My focus is on modern UI/UX design, clean and scalable architectures, and performance optimization. I'm always learning new technologies and ready to collaborate on challenging projects!

weatherly.title: Flutter Weather App
weatherly.desc: A complete Flutter app with beautiful UI/UX including smooth animations, State Management with Provider/Bloc, weather API integration, and support for multiple languages and dark/light themes.

todo_app.title: Task Management App
todo_app.desc: A modern Todo app built with Flutter featuring local storage with SQLite/Hive, beautiful animations, task categorization, and full Material Design 3 support.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce App
ecommerce.desc: A complete e-commerce app with Flutter including Firebase integration, authentication, shopping cart, online payment, and product management panel.
